column_description: The field "lineID" is used to record the ID of the bus route, which consists of a series of numeric strings
column_description_CN: 字段"lineID"用于记录该条公交线路的ID，是由一些数字字符组成

column_description: The field "name" is used to record the name of the bus route

column_description_CN: 字段"name"用于记录该条公交线路的名字

column_description: The field "start_stop"  is used to record the starting station of the bus route
column_description_CN: 字段"start_stop"用于记录该条公交线路的起点站

column_description: The field "start_time"  is used to record the departure time of the first bus from the starting station on this bus route
column_description_CN: 字段"start_time"用于记录该条公交线路首班车在起点站的发车时间
